GK19bahcar4u:4: vipule 'pi pṛthupratimo danta iva gaṇādhipasya mukhe // 4.2 //
GK19bahcar4u:17_0: teṣu caivamutpadyamāneṣu krameṇodapādi hūṇahariṇakesarī sindhurājajvaro gūrjaraprajāgaro
GK19bahcar4u:18: yo rājyāṅgasaṅgīnyabhiṣicyamāna eva malānīva mumoca dhanāni /
GK19bahcar4u:19: yaḥ parakīyenāpi kātaravallabhena raṇamukhe tṛṇeneva dhṛtenālajjata jīvitena /
GK19bahcar4u:20: yaḥ karadhṛtadhautāsipratibimbitenātmanāpyadūyata samitiṣu sahāyena ripūṇāṃ puraḥ pradhaneṣu dhanuṣāpi namatā yo mānī mānasenākhidyata /
GK19bahcar4u:22: yaśca sarvāsu dikṣu samīkṛtataṭāvaṭaviṭapāṭavītarutṛṇagulmavalmīkagirigahanairdaṇḍayātrāpathaiḥ pṛthubhirbhṛtyopayogāya vyabhajateva vasudhāṃ bahudhā /
GK19bahcar4u:23: yaṃ cālabdhayuddhadohadamātmoyo 'pi sakalaripusamutsārakaḥ parakīya iva tatāpa pratāpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:30: yasya cāsanneṣu bhṛtyaratneṣu pratibimbateva tulyarūpā sa ptalakṣyata lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:36_0: yaśca vairamupāyanaṃ vigrahamanugrahaṃ samarāgamaṃ mahotsavaṃ śatruṃ nidhidarśanamaribāhulyamabhyudayamāhavāhvānaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:44: tasya ca janmāntare 'pi satī pārvatīva śaṅkarasya,
GK19bahcar4u:94: yaśomatī nāma mahādevī prāṇānāṃ praṇayasya visrambhasya dhramasya sukhasya ca bhūmirabhūt /
GK19bahcar4u:96: nisargata eva ca sa nṛpatirādityabhakto babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:97_0: pratidinamudaye dinakṛtaḥ snātaḥ sitadukūladhārī dhavalakarpaṭaprāvṛtaśirāḥ prāṅmukhaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:97_1: kṣitau jānubyāṃ sthitvā kuṅkumapaṅkānulipte maṇḍalake pavitrapajharāgapātrīnihitena
GK19bahcar4u:98: ajapacca japyaṃ sucaritaḥ pratyuṣasi madhyandine dinānte cāpatyahetoḥ prādhvaṃ prayatena manasā jañjapūko mantramādityahṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:100: yataḥ sarājā kadācid grīṣmasamaye yadṛcchayā sitakarakarasitasudhādhavalasya harmyasya pṛṣṭe suṣvāpa /
GK19bahcar4u:101: vāmapārśve cāsya dvitīyaśayane devī yaśomatī śiśye /
GK19bahcar4u:106_0: rājani ca vimalanavapratibimbitābhiḥ saṃvāhyamānacaraṇa iva tārakābhiḥ visrabdhaprasāritairdigaṅganānāmivārpitairaṅgairmadhusugandhibhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:107: paritrāyasva paritrāyasva' iti bhāṣamāṇā bhūṣaṇaraveṇa vyāharantīva parijanamutkampamānāṅgayaṣṭirudatiṣṭhat /
GK19bahcar4u:108: atha tena sarvasyāmapi pṛthivyāmaśrutapūrveṇa kimuta devīmukhe paritrāyasveti dhvaninā dagdha iva śravaṇayorekapada eva nidrāṃ tatyāja rājā /
GK19bahcar4u:109: śirobhāgācca kopakampamānadakṣiṇakarākṛṣṭena karṇotpaleneva nirgacchatācchadhāreṇa dhautāsinā sīmantayanniva niśām,
GK19bahcar4u:111: karavikṣepavegagalitena hṛdayeneva bhayanimittānveṣiṇā bhramatā dikṣu kanakavalayena virājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:113: puraḥ patitenāsidhārāgocaragatena śaśimayūkhakhaṇḍeneva khaṇḍitena hāreṇa rājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:115: baddhāndhakārayā tripatākayā bhrukuṭyā punariva triyāmāṃ parivartayan “devi/
GK19bahcar4u:116: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam' ityabhidadhāno vegenotpapāta /
GK19bahcar4u:117: sarvāsu ca dikṣu vikṣiptacakṣuryadā nādrākṣītkiñcidapi tadā papraccha tāṃ bhayakāraṇam /
GK19bahcar4u:120: śānte ca hṛdayotkampakāriṇi sādhvase sā samabhāṣata--“āryaputra/
GK19bahcar4u:121: jānāmi svapne bhagavataḥ saviturmaṇḍalānnirgatya dvau kumārakau,
GK19bahcar4u:134: tau ca me vilapantyāḥ śastreṇodaraṃ vidārya praveṣṭumārabdhau /
GK19bahcar4u:137: etasminneva ca kālakrame rājalakṣmyāḥ prathamālāpaḥ prathayanniva svapnaphalamupatoraṇaṃ rarāṇa prabhātaśaṅkhaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:141_0: puruṣaśca vallabhaturaṅgamandurāmandire mandamandaṃ suptotthitaḥ saptīnāṃ kṛtamadhuraheṣāravāṇāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:155: tataḥ samatikrānte kasmiṃścitkālāṃśe devyāṃ ca yaśomatyāṃ devo rājyavardhanaḥ prathamameva saṃbabhūva garbhe /
GK19bahcar4u:156: garbhasthitasyaiva ca yasya yaśaseva pāṇḍutāmādata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:159: śanaiḥ śanairupacīyamānagarbhamarālasā ca gurubhirvāritāpi vandanāya kayamapi sakhībhirhastāvalambenānīyata /
GK19bahcar4u:169: āstāṃ nūpurabhārakheditaṃ caraṇayugalaṃ manasāpi nodasahata saudhamāroḍhum /
GK19bahcar4u:173: divasaṃ cādhomukhī stanapṛṣṭhasaṃkrāntenāpatyadarśanautsukyādantaḥ praviṣṭeneva mukhakamalenaivaṃ prīyamāṇā dadarśa garbham /
GK19bahcar4u:174: udare tanayena hṛdaye ca bharvā tiṣṭhatā dviguṇitāmiva lakṣmīmuvāha /
GK19bahcar4u:175: sakhyutsaṅgamuktaśarīrā ca śarīraparicārikāṇāmaṅkeṣu sapatnīnāṃ tu śiraḥsu pādau cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:176: avatīrṇe ca daśame māsi sarvorvībhṛtpakṣapātāya vajraparamāṇubiriva nirmitam,
GK19bahcar4u:179: yasmiṃśca jāte jātapramodā nṛtyamayya ivājāyanta prajāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:181_1: stambitatāmarase vikasitacātakacetasi mūkamānasaukasi nabhasi māsi devyā devakyā
GK19bahcar4u:181_2: iva cakrapāṇiryaśomatyā hṛdaye garbhe ca samameva saṃbabhūva harṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:183: garbhārambheṇa śyāmāyamānacārucūcukacūliko cakravartinaḥ pātuṃ mudritāviva payodharakalaśau babhāroraḥsthaleva /
GK19bahcar4u:186: marndaṃ-mandaṃ saṃcarantyā nirmalamaṇikuṭṭimanimagnapratibimbanibhena gṛhīta pādapallavā pūrvasevāmivārebhe pṛtivyasyāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:188: kṣapāsu saudhaśikharāgragatāyā garbhonmāthamaktāṃśuke stanamaṇḍale saṃkrāntamuḍupatimaṇḍalamupari garbhasya śvetātapatramiva kenāpi dhāryamāṇamadṛśyata /
GK19bahcar4u:193: api ca caturṇāmapi mahārṇavānāmekīkṛtenāmbhasā snātuṃ vāñchā babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:196: saṃnihiteṣvapi maṇidarpaṇeṣu mukhamutkhāte khaḍāgapaṭṭe vīkṣituṃ vyasanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:201: ātmocitasthānaniṣaṇṇāśca mahānto vividhauṣadhidharā bhiṣajo bhūdharā iva bhuvo dhṛtiṃ cakruḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:202: payonidhīnāṃ hṛdayānīva lakṣmyā sahāgatāni grīvāsūtragranthiṣu praśastaratnānyabadhyatta /
GK19bahcar4u:203: tataśca prāpte jyeṣṭhāmūlīye māsi bahulāsu bahulapakṣadvādasyāṃ vyatīte pradoṣasamaye samārurukṣati kṣapāyauvane sahasaivāntaḥpure samudapādi kolāhalaḥ strījanasya /
GK19bahcar4u:204: nirgatya ca saṃbhramaṃ yaśovatyāḥ svayameva hṛdayanirviśeṣā dhātryāḥ sutā supātreti nāmnā rājñaḥ pādayornipatya “deva /
GK19bahcar4u:205: diṣṭyā vardhase dvitīyasutajanmanā' iti vyāharantī pūrṇapātraṃ jahāra /
GK19bahcar4u:206: asminneva ca kāle rājñaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ śataśaḥ saṃvāditātīndriyādeśaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:209: sakalagaṇakamadhye mahito hitaśca trikālajñānabhāgbhojakastārako nāma gaṇakaḥ samupasṛtya vijñāpitavān--“deva/
GK19bahcar4u:210: śrūyate māndhātā kilaivaṃvidhe vyatīpātādisarvadoṣābhiṣaṅgharahite 'hani sarveṣūccasthānasthiteṣvevaṃ graheṣvīdṛśi lagne bheje janma /
GK19bahcar4u:211: arvāktato 'sminnantarāle punarevaṃvidhe yoge cakravarttijanane nājani jagati kaścidaparaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:212_0: saptānāṃ cakravartināmagraṇariścakravarticihnānāṃ mahāratnānāṃ ca bhājanaṃ saptānāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:212_1: sāgarāṇāṃ pālayitā saptatantūnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pravartayitā saptasaptisamaḥ suto 'yaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:213: atrāntare svayamevānādmātā api tāramadhuraṃ śahkhā viresuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:219: vavau cācirāccakrāyudhamutsṛjantyā lakṣmyā niśvāsa iva surāmodasurabhirdivyānilaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:223: prahatamaṅgalatūryapratiśabdanibhena dikṣu dikpālairapi pramoda dakriyatena diṣṭavṛddhikalakalaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:224: tatkṣaṇa eva ca śuklavāsaso brahnamukhāḥ kṛtayugaprajāpatayaiva prajāvṛddheye samupatasthire dvijātayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:227: pralambaśmaśrujālajaṭilānanāni bahalamalapaṅkakalaṅkakālakāyāni naśyataḥ kalikālasya bāndhavakulānīvākulānyadhāvanta muktāni bandhanavṛndāni /
GK19bahcar4u:240_0: sindūrapātrāṇi ca piṣṭātakapātrāṇi ca bālalatālambamānaviṭakavīṭakāṃśca tāmbūlavṛkṣakān
GK19bahcar4u:250: sanandanavana iva pārijātakāmodaiḥ sanīhāra iva karpūrareṇubhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:306: kāścitkaṇṭhanihitakāñcanakāñcīguṇāñcitakañcukivikārākuñcitabruvaḥ kāmavāgurā iva prasāritabāhupāśā rājamahiṣyaḥ prārabdhanṛttā vilesuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:307: sarvataśca nṛtyataḥ streṇasya galadabhiḥ pādālaktakairaruṇitā rāgamayīva śuśoṇa kṣoṇī /
GK19bahcar4u:311: cañcalānāṃ cakṣuṣāmaṃ śubhiḥ kṛṣṇasāramayā ivāsan vāsarāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:314: utkṣiptairhastakisalayaiḥ kamalinīmayya iva babhāsire sṛṣṭayaḥ māṇikyendrāyudhānāmarciṣā cārṣipatramayā iva cakāśire ravimarīcayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:315: raṇatāmābharaṇagaṇānāṃ pratiśabdakaiḥ kiṅkiṇīmayya iva śiśiñjire diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:321: diśi diśi kuberakoṣā ivālupyanta lokena draviṇarāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:337: ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣamavatarati ca rājyavardhane devī yaśomatī garbheṇādhatta nārāyaṇamūrtiriva vasudhāṃ devīṃ rājyaśriyam /
GK19bahcar4u:346: yayā dvayoḥ sutayorapi stanayorivaikāvalīlatayā nitarāmarājata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:347: arimanneva tu kāle devyā yaśomatyā bhrātā sutamaṣṭavarṣadeśīyamudbhūyamānakuṭilakākapakṣakaśikhaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaparaśuhuṅkārāgnidhūmalekhānubaddhamūrdhānaṃ makaradhvajamiva punarjātam,
GK19bahcar4u:348: ekenendranīlakuṇḍalāśuśyāmalitena śarīrārdhenetareṇa ca trikaṇṭakamuktāphalālokadhavalitena saṃpṛttāvatāramiva hariharayordarśayantam,
GK19bahcar4u:351: śaiśave 'pi savāṣṭambhaṃ bījamiva voryadramasya bhaṇḍināmānamanucaraṃ kumārayorarpitavān /
GK19bahcar4u:352: avanipatestu tasyopari putrayostṛtīyasya netrayoriveśvarasya tulyaṃ darśanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:353: rājaputrāvapi sakalajīvalokahṛdayānādadāyinī tena prakṛtidakṣiṇena madhumādhavāviva malayamārutenopetau nitarāṃ rejatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:354: krameṇacāpareṇeva bhrātrā prajānandena saha vardhamānau yauvanamavateratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:355: sthirorustambhau ca pṛthuprakoṣṭhau dīrghabhujārgalau vikaṭoraḥkavāṭau prāṃśuśālābhirāmau mahānagarasaṃniveśāviva sarvalokāśrayakṣamau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:385_1: iti harṣa iti sarvasyāmeva pṛthivyāmāvirbhūtaśabdaprādurbhāvau svalpīyasaiva kālena
GK19bahcar4u:386: ekadā ca tāvāhūya bhuktavānabhyantaragataḥ pitā sasnehamavādīt--“vatsau/
GK19bahcar4u:389: prāyeṇa paramāṇava iva samavāyeṣvanuguṇībhūya dravyaṃ kurvanti pārthivaṃ kṣudrāḥ krīḍārasena nartayantatau mayūratāṃ nayanti bāliśāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:393: cātakā iva tṛṣṇāvanto na śakyante grahītumakulīnāḥ mānase mīnamiva sphurantamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇanti jālikāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:396_0: yataḥ sarvairebhirdeṣābhiṣaṅgairasaṃgatau babhudhaipadhābhiḥ parīkṣitau śucī vinītau
GK19bahcar4u:396_1: vikrāntāvabhirūpau mālavarājaputrau bhrātarau bujāviva me śarīrādavyatiriktau kumāraguptamādhavaguptanāmānāvasmābhirbhavatoranucaratvārthamimau nirdiṣṭau /
GK19bahcar4u:399: na cirād dvāradeśanihitalocanau rājyavardhanaharṣau pratīhāreṇa saha praviśantam,
GK19bahcar4u:400: agrato jyeṣṭhamaṣṭādaśavarṣavayasaṃ nātyuccaṃ nātikharvamatigurubhiḥ padanyāsairanekanarapatisaṃcaraṇacalāṃ niścalīkurvāṇamivorvīm,
GK19bahcar4u:407: acapalāstamitatārakeṇādhomukhena cakṣuṣā śikṣayantamiva lakṣmīlābhottānitamukhāni paṅkajavanāni vinayam,
GK19bahcar4u:415: pṛṣṭhatastasya kanīyāṃsamatiprāṃśutayā gauratayā ca manaḥ śilāśelamiva saṃcarantam,
GK19bahcar4u:416: anulbaṇamālatīkusumaśekharanibhena nirjigamiṣatā guruṇa śirasi cumbitamiva yaśasā,
GK19bahcar4u:418: atidhīratayā hṛdayanihitā svāmibhaktimiva niścalāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ dhārayantam,
GK19bahcar4u:419: acchācchacandanarasānulepanaśītalaṃ saṃnihitahāropadhānaṃ vakṣaḥsthalamanantasāmantasaṃkrānti śrāntāyāḥ śriyo viśālaṃ śaśimaṇiśilāpaṭṭaśayanamiva bibrāṇam,
GK19bahcar4u:420_0: cakṣuḥ kuraṅgakairghoṇāvaṃśaṃ varāhauḥ skandhapīṭhaṃ mahiṣaiḥ prakoṣṭhabandhaṃ vyāghraiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:421: praviśya ca tau dūrādeva caturbhirahgairuttamāṅgena ca gāṃ spṛśantau namaścakratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:423: muhūrtaṃ ca sthitvā bhūpatirādideśa tau--“adyaprabhṛti bhavadbhyāṃ kumārāvanuvartanīyau' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:424: “yathājñāpayati devaḥ' iti medinīdo lāyamānamaulibhyāmutthāya rājyavradhanaharṣau praṇematuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:426: tataścārabhya kṣaṇamapi nimeṣonmeṣāviva cakṣurgocarādanapayāntāvucchvāsaniḥśvāsāviva naktandivamabhimukhasthitau bhujāviva satatapārśvavartinau kumārayostau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:427: atha rājyaśrīrapi nṛttagītādiṣu vidagdhāsu sakhīṣu sakalāsu kalāsu ca pratidivasamupacīyamānaparicayā śanaiḥ śanairavardhata /
GK19bahcar4u:429: nipeturekasyāṃ tasyāṃ śarā iva lakṣyabhuvi bhūbhujāṃ sarveṣāṃ dṛṣaśṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:431: kadācittu rājāntaḥpuraprasādasthito bāhyakakṣyāvasthitena puruṣeṇa svaprastāvāgatāṃ gīyamānāmāryāmaśṛṇot--
GK19bahcar4u:434: tāṃ ca śrutvā pārśvasthitāṃ mahādevīmutsāritaparijano jagāda--“devi/
GK19bahcar4u:436: etadīyā guṇavatteva kṣaṇamapi hṛdayānnāpayāti me cintā /
GK19bahcar4u:437: yauvanārambha eva ca kanyakānābhindhanībhavanti pitaraḥ saṃtāpānalasya /
GK19bahcar4u:439: kenāpi kṛtā dharmyā nābhimatā me sthitireyaṃ yadaṅgasaṃbhūtānyaṅkalālitānyaparityājyānyapatyakānyakāṇḍa evāgatyāsaṃstutairnīyante /
GK19bahcar4u:441: seyaṃ sarvābhibhāvinī śokāgnedahiśaktiryadapatyatve samāne 'pi jātāyāṃ duhitari dūyante santaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:442: etadrathaṃ janmakāla eva kanyakābhyaḥ prayacchanti salilamaśrubiḥ sādhavaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:444: ko hi nāma saheta sacetano virahamapatyānām /
GK19bahcar4u:445: yathā yathā samāpatanti dūtā varāṇāṃ varākī lajjamāneva cintā tathā tathā nitarāṃ praviśati mehṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:449: dharaṇīdharāṇāṃ ca mūrdhni sthito māheśvarā pādanyāsa iva sakalabhuvananamaskṛto maukharo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:450: tatrāpi tilakabhūtasyāvantivarmaṇaḥ sūnuragrajo grahavarmā nāma grahapatiriva gāṃ gataḥ pituranyūno guṇairenāṃ prārthayate /
GK19bahcar4u:451: yadi bhavatyā api matiranumanyate tatastasmai dātumicchāmi' ityuktavati bhartari duhitṛsnehakātaratarahadayā sāśrulocanā mahādevī pratyuvāca--āryaputra/
GK19bahcar4u:452: saṃvardhanamātropayoginyo dhātrīnirviśeṣā bhavanti khalu mātaraḥ kanyakānām /
GK19bahcar4u:455: yathā neyaṃ yāvajjavīvamāvayorārgitāṃ prati padyate tathāryaputra eva jānāti' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:456: rājā tu jātaniścayo duhitṛdānaṃ prati samāhūya sutāvapi viditārthāvakārṣīt /
GK19bahcar4u:457: śobhate ca divase grahavarmaṇā kanyāṃ prārthayituṃ preṣitasya pūrvāgatasyaiva pradhānadūtapuruṣasya kare sarvarājakulasamakṣaṃ duhitṛdānalalamapātayat /
GK19bahcar4u:458: jātamudi kṛtārthe gate ca tasminnāsanneṣu ca vivāhadivaseṣūddāmadīyamānatāmbūlapaṭavāsakusumaprasādhitasarvalokam,
GK19bahcar4u:477_0: āsūryodayācca praviṣṭābhiḥ satībhiḥ subhagābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ suveśābhiravidha vābhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:479_3: stambhairujjvalaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cautsukyadaṃ ca maṅgalyaṃ cāsīdrājakulam /
GK19bahcar4u:480: devī tu yaśomatī vivāhotsavaparyākulahṛdayā hṛdayena bhartari,
GK19bahcar4u:489: bhūpatirapyuparyupari visarjitoṣṭravāmījanitajāmātṛjoṣaḥ satyapyājñāsaṃpādanadakṣe mukhekṣaṇapare parijane samaṃ putrābhyāṃ duhitṛsnehavivalavaḥ sarvaṃ svayamakarot /
GK19bahcar4u:490: evaṃ ca tasminnavidhavāmaya iva bhavati rājakule,
GK19bahcar4u:497: lakṣmīmaya iva vijṛmbhamāṇe mahotsave nidhāna iva sukhasya,
GK19bahcar4u:498: phala iva janmanaḥ pariṇāma iva puṇyasya,
GK19bahcar4u:510: jāmāturantikāttāmbūladāyakaḥ pārijātakanāmā saṃptāptaḥ' ityabhidhāya svākāraṃ yuvānamadarśayat /
GK19bahcar4u:514: asau tu samākarmitanarādhipadhvanirdhāvamānaḥ katicitpadānyupasṛtya prasārya ca bāhū sevācaturaściraṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ nirdhāya mūrdhānamutthāya “deva/
GK19bahcar4u:515: kuśalau yathājñāpayasyarcayati ca devaṃ namaskāreṇa' iti vyajñāpayat /
GK19bahcar4u:516: āgatajāmātṛnivedanāgataṃ ca taṃ jñātvā kṛtasatkāraṃ rājā “yāminyāḥ prathame yāme vivāhakālātyayakṛto yathā na bhavati doṣaḥ' iti saṃdiśya pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK19bahcar4u:517: atha sakalakamalavanalakṣmīṃ vadhūmukha iva saṃcārya samavasite vāsare,
GK19bahcar4u:520: saubhāgyadhvaja iva raktāṃ śukasukumāravapuṣi nabhasi sphurati saṃdhyārāge,
GK19bahcar4u:522: lagnasaṃpādanasajja ivojjihāne jyotirgaṇe vivāhamahgalakalaśa ivodayaśikhariṇā samutkṣipyamāṇe vardhamānadhavalacchāye tārādhipamaṇḍale,
GK19bahcar4u:525: calakarṇacāmarāṇāṃ cāmīkaramaya sarvopakaraṇānāṃ varṇakalambināṃ balināṃ ghaṇṭāṭāṅkāriṇāṃ kariṇāṃ ghaṭābhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:527: nakṣatramālāmaṇḍitamukhīṃ kariṇariṃ niśākara iva paurandarīṃ diśamārūḍhaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:532: kusumasaurabhagarvabhrāntabhramarakulakalakalapralāpasubhagaḥ pārijāta iva jātaḥ śriyā saha punaravatārito medinīm,
GK19bahcar4u:533: navavadhūvadanāvalokanakutūhaleneva kṛṣyamāṇahṛdayaḥ patanniva mukhena pratyāsannalagno grahavarmā /
GK19bahcar4u:534: rājā tu tamupadvāramāgataṃ caraṇābhyāmeva rājacakrānugamyamānaḥ sasutaḥ pratyujjagāma /
GK19bahcar4u:535: avatīrṇaṃ ca taṃ kṛtanamaskāraṃ manmathamiva mādhavaḥ prasāritabhujo gāḍhamāliliṅga /
GK19bahcar4u:536: yathākramaṃ pariṣvaktarājyavardhanaharṣaṃ ca haste gṛhītvābhyantaraṃ ninye /
GK19bahcar4u:538: na cirācca gambhīranāmā nṛpateḥ praṇayī vidvāndvijanamā grahavarmāṇamuvāca--“tāta/
GK19bahcar4u:539: tvāṃ prāpya cirātkhalu rājyaśriyā ghaṭitau tejomayau sakalajagadgoyamānabudhakarṇānandakāriguṇagaṇau somasūryavaṃśāviva puṣyabhūtimukaravaṃśau /
GK19bahcar4u:540: prathamameva kaustubhamaṇiriva guṇaiḥ sthito 'si hṛdaye devasya /
GK19bahcar4u:541: idānīṃ tu śaśīva sirasā parameśvareṇāsi voḍhavyo jātaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:546: gaccha' iti gadito grahavarmā praviśyānta puraṃ jāmātṛdarśanakutūhalinīnāṃ strīṇāṃ patitāni locanasahasrāṇi vikacanīlakuvalayavanānīva laṅghayannāsasāda kautukagṛhadvāram /
GK19bahcar4u:549: aruṇāṃśukāvaguṇṭhitamukhīṃ prabātasaṃdhyāmiva svaprabhayā niṣprabhānpradīpakānkurvāṇām atisaukumāryaśaṅkiteneva yauvanena nātinirbharamupagūḍhām,
GK19bahcar4u:558: prabhālāvaṇyamadasaurabhamādhuryaiḥ kaustubhaśaśimadirāpārijātāmṛtaprabhavaiḥ sarvaratnaguṇairaparāṇiva surāsurasṣā ratnākareṇa kalpitāṃ śriyam,
GK19bahcar4u:559: snigdhena bālikālokena sitasiraṇamarakataprabhāharitaśādvalena kapolasthalītalena vinodayantīmiva hāriṇīṃ locanacchāyām,
GK19bahcar4u:560: adhomukhaṃ varakautukālokanākulaṃ muhurmuhuḥ kutamukhannamanaprayatnaṃ sakhījanaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca nirbhartsayantī vadhūmapaśyat /
GK19bahcar4u:561: praviśantameva taṃ hṛdayacauraṃ vadhvā samarpitaṃ jagrāha kandarpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:562: parihāsasmeramkhībiśca nārībhiḥ kautukagṛhe yadyatkāryate jāmatātā tattatsarvamatipeśalaṃ cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:563: kṛtapariṇayānurūpaveśaparigrahāṃ gṛhītvā kare vadhūṃ nirjagāma jagāma ca navasudhādhavalā nimantritāgataistuṣāraśailopatyakāmiva tryambakāmbikāvivāhāhūtairbhūbhṛdbhiḥ parivṛtām,
GK19bahcar4u:568: āruroha ca tāṃ divamiva sajyotsnaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar4u:569: samutsasarpa ca vellitāruṇaśikhāpallavasya śikhinaḥ kusumāyudha iva ratidvitīyo raktāśokasya samīpam /
GK19bahcar4u:570: hute ca hutabhuji pradakṣiṇāvartapravṛttābhirvadhūvadanavilokanakutūhalinībhiriva jvālābhireva saha pradakṣiṇaṃ babhrāma /
GK19bahcar4u:574: parisamāpitavaivāhikakriyākalāpastu jāmātā vadhvā smaṃ praṇanāma śvaśurau /
GK19bahcar4u:579_1: sākṣāllakṣmyevoddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkahastayā sanāthena sopadhānena svāstīrṇena śayanena śobhamānam,
GK19bahcar4u:580: śayanasirobhāgasthitena ca kṛtakumudaśobhena kusumāyudhasāhāyakāyāgatena śaśineva nidrākalaśena rājatena virājamānaṃ vāsagṛham /
GK19bahcar4u:581_0: tatra ca hrītāyā navavadhūkāyāḥ parāṅmukhaprasuptāyā maṇibhittidarpaṇeṣu mukhapratibimbāni
GK19bahcar4u:582: sthitvā ca śvaśurakule śīlenāmṛtamiva śvaśrūhṛdaye varṣannabhinavābhinavopacārairapunaruktānyānandamayāni daśa dināni,
GK19bahcar4u:583: dattvā ca rājadauvārikamiva rājakule raṇaraṇakaṃ yautakaniveditānīva śambalānyādāya hṛdayāni sarvalarokasya kathaṅkathamapi visarjito nṛpeṇa vadhvā saha svadeśamagamaditi /
GK19bahcar4u:584: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite cakravartijanmavarṇanaṃ nāma caturtha ucchvāsaḥ/
